description: Plan your next nature adventure with these great hikes near Seattle!

Visit the biggest tourist attraction in Seattle! Pike Place is known for its vibrant atmosphere, diverse fresh produce, crafts, unique shops, providing a rich cultural and culinary experience for both visitors and locals.
Go to Gas Works and enjoy the view of Seattle with your friends!
UW recreation offers health and wellness classes including climbing courses, backpacking, dance classes, and intramural sports.
Anger management workbook to write out all of your feelings with guided prompts.
UW IMA offers an array of recreational and sports programs at the University of Washington, encouraging student participation in sports and fitness activities to promote a healthy lifestyle.
Rage room
Youtube video with a 10-minute meditation if you are feeling angry.

resource_name: How to manage anxiety and fear
description: Resource for managing feelings of anxiety and fear.
Journaling, breathing exercises, guided meditations

Spending time in green spaces can alleviate anxiety and offer time for reflection and solitude. When feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities, it can be helpful to be in this environment which facilitates mindfulness practices.
Simple way to visualize and get in control of your breathing.
Collect your thoughts and manage your emotions with this AI-centered online journal!
Husky HelpLine is available to support you with same-day access to a Licensed Mental Health Counselor. This service is open 24/7 and there are several ways to connect.
Take a walk around Discovery Park to get your mind off of things.
This is a podcast with Helen Russell who is a happiness researcher.

resource_name: UW CATS (Center for Anxiety and Trauma Stress)
description: UW center that conducts research to better understand treatment of stress and anxiety and provide a state-of-the-art clinical care for those suffering from these emotions
Reading with Rover is an organization that focuses on mental health with therapy dogs.
Rage room
Karaoke with your friends to relieve your stress.
